title: Zuck wants to build AR NFTs for Instagram because… maybe he’s bored?
content:
IT’S HERE. If you were eagerly waiting for NFTs to arrive on Instagram, the moment is has arrived. You can share NFTs on your feed, in stories, and in messages. But for now, you have to be in the US and you have to be one of the “handful of creators and collectors” chosen by Instagram to use the feature. So much for decentralization, eh? Instagram’s head, Adam Mosseri, said in a video that you’ll be able to see NFTs with a “digital collectibles” tag. If you tap on it, you’ll see details like a description of the NFT, the…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Instagram
description: Instagram is testing NFT sharing with a select number of creators based in the US. But it's ambitions with digital collectibles are lofty.
